name: Solitaire ◂
description:
Enjoy the classic Solitaire game for free NOW!

Solitaire Legend is the classic Klondike solitaire (Patience) game you have played before with a deck of cards in the real life or with a mouse in the desktop PC.

There are also various of features added to this classic game which make Solitaire Legend more fun and enjoyable:

- You can customize the front and back of the cards, alongside with the background of the screen, make it a unique and beautiful game sets for you;

- You can challenge your brain with hand-crafted well-designed Daily Puzzles and win medals each month you play;

- You will have unlimited Hints and Undo to help you overcome the most difficult levels;

- The magic solver will guide you through the tough puzzles when needed, so you will learn and become a master of the Solitaire Legend game.

Any other thoughts? Don't hesitate and download the Solitaire Legend now for FREE!
